title: New: SOHN – Lessons
body: Having blown away every crowd at SXSW this year, and now with his debut [London show](https://www.songkick.com/events/18013049?utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=upcoming%2Fdaily_digest&utm_content=buy-tickets-button) announced for later this year, 4AD artist **SOHN** has returned with new track _Lessons_. Building upon the walls of synths that marked his initial outings, it’s darker, more composed and as eerily soulful as ever. Check out _Lessons_ below, presumably taken from his debut LP, expected next year.
